Description: Duplicate AESEQ values within same subject violates SDTM requirement
Action_Required: Re-sequence AESEQ to be unique within each USUBJID using cumulative count

Description: Fatal and life-threatening adverse events must be marked as serious
Action_Required: UPDATE ae SET AESER='Y' WHERE AESEV IN ('FATAL' 'LIFE THREATENING')

Description: Invalid causality term - does not match CDISC CT
Action_Required: UPDATE ae SET AEREL='UNLIKELY' WHERE AEREL='UNLIKELY RELATED'

Description: Invalid causality term - does not match CDISC CT
Action_Required: UPDATE ae SET AEREL='PROBABLE' WHERE AEREL='PROBABLY RELATED'

Description: Invalid outcome term - does not match CDISC CT
Action_Required: UPDATE ae SET AEOUT='RECOVERED/RESOLVED' WHERE AEOUT='RESOLVED'

Description: Invalid outcome term - ambiguous ongoing status
Action_Required: UPDATE ae SET AEOUT='RECOVERING/RESOLVING' WHERE AEOUT='CONTINUING' AND AEENDTC IS NULL

Description: ISO 8601 violation - partial date missing hyphen separator
Action_Required: Fix format: AESTDTC = '2009-01'

Description: ISO 8601 violation - partial date missing hyphen separator
Action_Required: Fix format: AESTDTC = '2009-01'

Description: ISO 8601 violation - invalid decimal point in date
Action_Required: Fix format: AEENDTC = '2008-09' (remove .0)

Description: ISO 8601 violation - partial date missing hyphen separator
Action_Required: Fix format: AEENDTC = '2009-01'

Description: SAE missing end date - document if ongoing or populate
Action_Required: Populate AEENDTC or set AEENRF='ONGOING' and add narrative

Description: SAE missing end date - document if ongoing or populate
Action_Required: Populate AEENDTC or set AEENRF='ONGOING' and add narrative

Description: Life-threatening SAE missing end date
Action_Required: Populate AEENDTC or set AEENRF='ONGOING' and add narrative

Description: SAE missing end date - document if ongoing or populate
Action_Required: Populate AEENDTC or set AEENRF='ONGOING' and add narrative

Description: Fatal SAE must have death flag set
Action_Required: UPDATE ae SET AESDTH='Y' WHERE AETERM='DISEASE PROGRESSION' AND AEOUT='FATAL'

Description: Life-threatening SAE must have life-threatening flag set
Action_Required: UPDATE ae SET AESLIFE='Y' WHERE AETERM='HYPERBILIRUBINEMIA' AND AESEV='LIFE THREATENING'

Description: All SAE criterion flags are missing
Action_Required: Populate SAE criterion flags from source CRF SAE forms

Description: Severe AEs not marked as serious - may be clinically appropriate but requires documentation
Action_Required: Review clinical justification and document decision or update AESER

Description: Outcome field missing for 8 records
Action_Required: Populate AEOUT with appropriate value or 'UNKNOWN' if not documented

Description: Severe/serious AEs with no drug modification
Action_Required: Review if appropriate clinical action was taken - may be valid

Description: Study-specific fields have high missing rates
Action_Required: Review with study team if custom qualifiers are protocol-required

Description: Cannot determine specific SAE criteria
Action_Required: Populate flags: AESCONG AESDISAB AESDTH AESHOSP AESLIFE AESMIE

Description: Subject IDs not cross-validated with Demographics domain
Action_Required: Cross-check USUBJID values against DM.USUBJID

Description: Visit numbers not cross-validated with visit domains
Action_Required: Validate VISITNUM against Trial Visits (TV) or Subject Visits (SV)

Description: End date missing for 120 records (may be ongoing)
Action_Required: Document ongoing status or populate end dates where available

Description: Action taken should align with severity
Action_Required: Review action taken for clinical appropriateness

Description: Ensure MedDRA version documented in Define-XML
Action_Required: Document MedDRA version and ensure consistency

Description: Cross-check AE dates are within reference start/end dates from DM
Review for potential duplicate data entry of same event
